name: A Sinister Night - Horror
description:
A Sinister Night

(This is an old College Project of mine that I really enjoyed making so I figured I'd release it)

You wake up in the middle of nowhere with a torch and no memory of what happened, freezing in the cold snow of a vast mountain range. With nothing else you can do, your best hope is to try and make your way out of there alive.

But will you be able to... ?

Disclaimer: THIS IS A SCARY GAME

Credit:
Assets from Unreal Marketplace with some models made by me. The monsters base to work off of was made with makehuman. Sounds obtained from ZapSplat.com and Unreal Marketplace as well as some made by me.
